Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the application resource across all AWS Regions. For example:

arn:aws:gameliftstreams:us-west-2:123456789012:application/a-9ZY8X7Wv6

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN)  that uniquely identifies the application resource across all AWS Regions. For example:  arn:aws:gameliftstreams:us-west-2:123456789012:application/a-9ZY8X7Wv6.
An ID that uniquely identifies the application resource. For example: a-9ZY8X7Wv6.
